data.prayer: Father, help the 86,914 believers in Cangzhou to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Cangzhou, Hebei, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Cangzhou, Hebei, China know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Cangzhou access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 86,914 believers in Cangzhou to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Renqiu
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Renqiu, Hebei, China.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Cangzhou, Hebei, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: There are 1,145,700 people living in the county of Cangzhou. Only about 86,914 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the county of Cangzhou, Hebei, China has a population of 1,145,700.

We estimate Cangzhou has 86,914 people who might know Jesus, 18,509 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,040,277 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 86,914 believers in Cangzhou, Hebei, China to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
